prefs-toctree:
Section header in misc. preferences.
{{Identical|Table of contents}}
toctree-tog-expand:
Used as label for the checkbox at the {{msg-mw|Prefs-toctree}} section, in the {{msg-mw|Prefs-misc}} tab in [[Special:Preferences]].

This feature enables not only to '''expand''' but also to '''collapse''' (with [+]/[-] buttons).

See also:
* {{msg-mw|Toctree-tog-floated}}
